name: Hangman (Ludum Dare 48)
description:
The deeper you get in to this game, the deeper the meaning of this game becomes.

How to play

Try guessing the word, if you guess wrong someone gets a little closer to death.

Personal remarks

This is the first ever time I participated in a Game Jam. I made this game in under 5 hours because I did not have enough time to work on larger project. However, I learnt many things from this Game Jam and loved the experience and would really love to participate in future Game Jams.
